name: Eastwood Duel
description:
Challenge your friends in Eastwood Duel during the annual cow festival season.
Enter the arena and try to be the last cowboy standing by escaping the mad cow. 
Maybe you'll get rich too, but you'll have to stay alive until the end.

Presentation

Eastwood duel is a remake of Pong, made on its 50th anniversary using Gamemaker Studio 2 in 2 weeks.

It is necessary to have a controller to play (XBOX controller preferably).

Credits

A  game made by myself.

Musics:
JR Tundra by Red Hot Son
Country Swing by Geoy
The farm by PLUME
Bluegrass by Unknown

Check out my other games.
